name: Peanut Butter Blossoms
description: Vegan Peanut Butter Blossoms feature a soft, sugar coated peanut butter cookie and are topped with a chocolate kiss. A go-to holiday cookie!
recipeIngredient: 22  vegan chocolate kisses, chocolate chunks or ganache, see Notes

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Add 1/4 cup sugar to a small bowl and set aside (for rolling the cookies in).
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Add 1/4 cup sugar to a small bowl and set aside (for rolling the cookies in).

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, cream together the vegan butter, peanut butter and sugars. Stir in the almond milk and vanilla until well combined. You can use a hand mixer, stand mixer or just a large wooden spoon.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, cream together the vegan butter, peanut butter and sugars. Stir in the almond milk and vanilla until well combined. You can use a hand mixer, stand mixer or just a large wooden spoon.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add the flour to the bowl, and sprinkle the baking soda, baking powder, cornstarch and salt on top of the flour. Stir (or use the mixer) until just combined and a dough is formed. The dough will be thick, yet sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add the flour to the bowl, and sprinkle the baking soda, baking powder, cornstarch and salt on top of the flour. Stir (or use the mixer) until just combined and a dough is formed. The dough will be thick, yet sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Roll balls of dough (about 1.5 tablespoons) and then roll in the sugar until coated. Place each one on the prepared baking sheet about 2 inches apart.
recipeInstructions.name: Roll balls of dough (about 1.5 tablespoons) and then roll in the sugar until coated. Place each one on the prepared baking sheet about 2 inches apart.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 10-12 minutes, until they are lightly golden on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 10-12 minutes, until they are lightly golden on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the oven and allow them to cool on the baking sheet for about 10 minutes, then press a kiss (or piece of chocolate, or ganache) into each cookie until it sticks. Immediately place the baking sheet in the freezer for about 10 minutes so the chocolate doesn’t melt into the cookie. Only do one baking sheet at a time unless you have a lot of room in your freezer.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from the oven and allow them to cool on the baking sheet for about 10 minutes, then press a kiss (or piece of chocolate, or ganache) into each cookie until it sticks. Immediately place the baking sheet in the freezer for about 10 minutes so the chocolate doesn’t melt into the cookie. Only do one baking sheet at a time unless you have a lot of room in your freezer.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the freezer, eat and enjoy! Leftover cookies will keep for up to 5 days in a covered container at room temperature, and they can also be frozen.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from the freezer, eat and enjoy! Leftover cookies will keep for up to 5 days in a covered container at room temperature, and they can also be frozen.

keywords: peanut butter blossoms, vegan christmas cookies, vegan peanut butter blossoms
